abstract.text: An intent that contains information about media playable from your app.

legalNotices.copyright: Copyright © 2025 Apple Inc. All rights reserved.

inlineContent.text: to donate songs, movies, and other media the user plays in your app, or to recommend upcoming media, such as new TV shows or podcast episodes. The system uses these donations to offer the user relevant search results and suggestions.
supports playing audio in the background. See
for more information about supporting background audio in your app.
The following table lists additional attributes of this intent object:

abstract.text: Empower people to customize interactions for your app on their device.
A request to fulfill in your app or Intents extension.
An intent that contains information about media playable from your app.
Creates an intent that describes media content such as a song, podcast episode, or movie.
Initializes an intent that describes media content such as a song, podcast episode, or movie.
Initialize an intent that describes media content such as a song, podcast episode, or movie.
The media item container.
The media content.
An object that contains the search parameters.
A Boolean value that indicates whether the media plays in a shuffled order.
A Boolean value that indicates whether the media plays in a shuffled order.
The queue location for a media item during playback.
The repeat mode setting at the time the user plays the media item.
The playback speed for a media item.
The playback speed for a media item.
The resume playback setting at the time the user plays the media item.
The resume playback setting at the time the user plays the media item.
The interface an object implements to confirm and handle play media intents.
An intents handler’s response to a play media intent.
Constants that describe the playback queue location for a media item.
The possible repeat modes at the time the user plays the media item.
Add and configure an Intents app extension in your Xcode project.
Fine-tune voice controls and improve Siri Suggestions by sharing app capabilities, customized names, and listening habits with the system.

doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Si.title: Improving Siri Media Interactions and App Selection

abstract.text: A protocol that enables an object to be encoded and decoded for archiving and distribution.
A protocol that objects adopt to provide functional copies of themselves.
The group of methods that are fundamental to all Objective-C objects.
A protocol that enables encoding and decoding in a manner that is robust against object substitution attacks.
A type that can be hashed into a `Hasher` to produce an integer hash value.
A type that can be compared for value equality.
A type with a customized textual representation.
A type with a customized textual representation suitable for debugging purposes.
A type whose instances can be encoded, and appropriately passed, as elements of a C `va_list`.
